title: Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail: Stories
body: Stories         A National Park Ranger looks up at an image of marchers in 1965. NPS Photo  There are many stories to be told about the Selma to Montgomery March and the Civil Rights Movement. Read the stories from the people who were there, by clicking the links to the left.     You can also learn more about stories, events, and people of the Civil Rights Movement and the ongoing struggle for Civil Rights everywhere by visiting the National Park Service's website dedicated to Civil Rights Stories.
